body: Duergar are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. All duergar have the following racial traits.
name: Duergar

sections.body: Duergar are hearty and observant, but also stubborn and belligerent.
sections.name: +2 Constitution, +2 Wisdom, -4 Charisma

sections.body: Duergar have a base speed of 20 feet, but their speed is never modified by armor or encumbrance.
sections.name: Slow and Steady

sections.body: Duergar can see in the dark up to 120 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Duergar are immune to paralysis, phantasms, and poison. They also gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.
sections.name: Duergar Immunities

sections.body: Duergar receive a +4 racial bonus to their CMD against bull rush or trip attempts while on solid ground.
sections.name: Stability

sections.body: Duergar can cast enlarge person and invisibility each once per day, using their character level as their caster level. Both of these spell-like abilities affect the duergar only.
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.body: Duergar are dazzled as long as they remain in an area of bright light.
sections.name: Light Sensitivity

sections.body: Duergar begin play speaking Common, Dwarven, and Undercommon. Duergar with high Intelligence can choose bonus languages from the following: Aklo, Draconic, Giant, Goblin, Orc, Terran.
sections.name: Languages
